div.p: Annual mean time series of (a) global volume‐averaged temperature and (b) sea surface temperature. For years 20 to 100, the rate of change of global volume‐averaged temperature is 0.14 K/century for both N96ORCA1 (blue) and N216ORCA025 (green). The one year in the N216ORCA025 simulation with corrupted output (cf. Figure 9) has been interpolated for this and the following plots.
